betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oDealing high damage increases the chance of crit hits and increases rage.

This skill is levelled up by using bloodlust coins, found as loot in battle towers!

§fWhat I initially thought to be one form of magic, in actuality, is a multi-faceted system.
While it is evident that these powers have a common origin, their distinctness is also indisputable. This one almost feel like essence, but different, very different.
